languages.text: "{name}, ты..." {n}Боль во взгляде Ирлиэт уступает иной, непривычной эмоции — мягкой и бескрайне печальной.{/n} "Насколько же слепы были мои глаза, не сумевшие узреть великодушие твоей души. Если бы только я отринула сомнения, что обвили мою душу ядовитой змеей. Если бы разделила с тобой свою боль... Быть может, мы бы не оказались сейчас в Темном городе". {n}Ответ эльдарки, робкий и извиняющийся, едва слышен.{/n}

"{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, ты..." {n}Боль во взгляде Ирлиэт уступает иной, непривычной эмоции — мягкой и бескрайне печальной.{/n} "Насколько же слепы были мои глаза, не сумевшие узреть великодушие твоей души. Если бы только я отринула сомнения, что обвили мою душу ядовитой змеей. Если бы разделила с тобой свою боль... Быть может, мы бы не оказались сейчас в Темном городе". {n}Ответ эльдарки, робкий и извиняющийся, едва слышен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze is replaced by another, new emotion — tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to have failed to see the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply is a quiet rustle of leaves in the wind, timid and apologetic.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze is replaced by another, new emotion — tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to have failed to see the generosity of your soul. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply is a quiet rustle of leaves in the wind, timid and apologetic.{/n}

If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}様…」{n}ユリエットの視線にある痛みは、別の新しい感情、優しく、計り知れないほど悲しい感情へと変わっていく。{/n}「我の目は、陛下の魂の寛大さを見過ごすほどに盲目だった。毒蛇のようにまとわりついていた疑念を捨ててさえいれば。もし我が陛下と痛みを分かち合おうとしていたなら…おそらく今こんなふうに、仄暗き都の罠にはまっているようなことにはならなかっただろう」{n}彼女の返事は感謝に満ちた柔らかなもので、かろうじて聞き取れるほどのささやかなものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様…」{n}ユリエットの視線にある痛みは、別の新しい感情、優しく、計り知れないほど悲しい感情へと変わっていく。{/n}「我の目は、陛下の魂の寛大さを見過ごすほどに盲目だった。毒蛇のようにまとわりついていた疑念を捨ててさえいれば。もし我が陛下と痛みを分かち合おうとしていたなら…おそらく今こんなふうに、仄暗き都の罠にはまっているようなことにはならなかっただろう」{n}彼女の返事は感謝に満ちた柔らかなもので、かろうじて聞き取れるほどのささやかなものだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，你……”{n}伊莉耶特目光中的痛苦消失了，充满了温柔的意味，而又带着无法估量的悲伤。{/n}“我的双眼目不视物，没能看清你的灵魂如此慷慨。那个时候，我的疑虑像毒蛇一样缠绕着我，如果我当时能摆脱它们就好了。如果那个时候，我能告诉你我的痛苦就好了……或许我们就不会落入黑暗之城的陷阱中了。”{n}她的声音胆怯而歉疚不已，几乎难以听清。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你……”{n}伊莉耶特目光中的痛苦消失了，充满了温柔的意味，而又带着无法估量的悲伤。{/n}“我的双眼目不视物，没能看清你的灵魂如此慷慨。那个时候，我的疑虑像毒蛇一样缠绕着我，如果我当时能摆脱它们就好了。如果那个时候，我能告诉你我的痛苦就好了……或许我们就不会落入黑暗之城的陷阱中了。”{n}她的回答仿佛树叶在风中平静的沙沙声，胆怯而歉疚不已。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «{name}...». {n}El dolor en la mirada de Yrliet da paso a una nueva emoción, tierna y extremadamente triste.{/n} «Tuve que estar ciega para no ver la generosidad de tu alma. Si tan solo me hubiera deshecho de las dudas que se habían arremolinado a mi alrededor como serpientes venenosas... Si tan solo hubiera intentado compartir mi dolor contigo... tal vez ahora no nos encontraríamos a merced de la Ciudad Siniestra». {n}Su respuesta, tímida y pesarosa, es casi inaudible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «{name}...». {n}El dolor en la mirada de Yrliet da paso a una nueva emoción, tierna y extremadamente triste.{/n} «Tuve que estar ciega para no ver la generosidad de tu alma. Si tan solo me hubiera deshecho de las dudas que se habían arremolinado a mi alrededor como serpientes venenosas... Si tan solo hubiera intentado compartir mi dolor contigo... tal vez ahora no nos encontraríamos a merced de la Ciudad Siniestra». {n}Su respuesta es el sutil susurro de las hojas al viento, tímida y pesarosa.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, Ihr ..." {n}Der Schmerz in Yrliets Blick weicht einer anderen, neuen Emotion, zart und unermesslich traurig.{/n} "Meine Augen waren blind, die Großzügigkeit Eurer Seele zu übersehen. Hätte ich doch nur meine Zweifel abgeschüttelt, die sich um mich gewunden hatten wie giftige Schlangen. Hätte ich doch nur versucht, meinen Schmerz mit Euch zu teilen ... Vielleicht wären wir dann jetzt nicht in der Dunklen Stadt gefangen." {n}Ihre Antwort, ängstlich und zaghaft, ist kaum hörbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}, Ihr ..." {n}Der Schmerz in Yrliets Blick weicht einer anderen, neuen Emotion, zart und unermesslich traurig.{/n} "Meine Augen waren blind, die Großzügigkeit Eurer Seele zu übersehen. Hätte ich doch nur meine Zweifel abgeschüttelt, die sich um mich gewunden hatten wie giftige Schlangen. Hätte ich doch nur versucht, meinen Schmerz mit Euch zu teilen ... Vielleicht wären wir dann jetzt nicht in der Dunklen Stadt gefangen." {n}Ihre Antwort ist ein leises Rascheln von Blättern im Wind, schüchtern und entschuldigend.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, vous... » {n}Une nouvelle émotion vient remplacer la douleur dans le regard d'Yrliet : une douce tendresse mêlée d'une incommensurable tristesse.{/n} « J'ai été aveugle à la générosité de votre âme. Si seulement je n'avais pas laissé le doute m'étreindre et m'étouffer comme un serpent... Si seulement j'avais partagé ma souffrance avec vous... Alors, peut-être ne serions-nous pas tombés dans le piège de la Cité Crépusculaire. » {n}Sa réponse, timide et navrée, est à peine audible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {name}, vous... »{n}Une nouvelle émotion vient remplacer la douleur dans le regard d'Yrliet : une douce tendresse mêlée d'une incommensurable tristesse.{/n} « J'ai été aveugle à la générosité de votre âme. Si seulement je n'avais pas laissé le doute m'étreindre et m'étouffer comme un serpent... Si seulement j'avais partagé ma souffrance avec vous... Alors, peut-être ne serions-nous pas tombés dans le piège de la Cité Crépusculaire. » {n}Sa réponse, timide et navrée, est aussi discrète que le bruissement des feuilles qui volent au vent.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, sen..." {n}Yrliet'in bakışlarındaki acının yerini; hassas ve inanılmaz kederli, başka bir duygu alıyor.{/n} "Gözlerim kör olmuş, ruhunun büyüklüğünü görmezden gelmişim. Keşke zehirli yılanlar misali çevremi saran kuşkuları başımdan savsaymışım. Keşke acımı seninle paylaşmayı deneseymişim... Belki de şimdi Kara Şehir'in kıskacında olmazdık." {n}Yrliet'in mahcup ve pişman cevabı, zar zor duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, you..." {n}The pain in Yrliet's gaze gives way to another, new emotion, tender and immeasurably sad.{/n} "My eyes were blind to overlook the generosity of your soul. If only I had cast off my doubts that had coiled around me like venomous serpents. If only I had sought to share my pain with you... perhaps we would not be standing in the snare of the Dark City now." {n}Her reply, timid and apologetic, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}, sen..." {n}Yrliet'in bakışlarındaki acının yerini hassas ve inanılmaz kederli bir başka duygu alıyor.{/n} "Gözlerim kör olmuş, ruhunun büyüklüğünü görmezden gelmişim. Keşke zehirli yılanlar misali çevremi saran kuşkuları başımdan savsaymışım. Keşke acımı seninle paylaşmayı deneseymişim... Belki de şimdi Kara Şehir'in kıskacında olmazdık." {n}Yrliet'in mahcup ve pişman cevabı zar zor duyuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
